body_text.text: Macroeconomic Dynamics publishes research of the highest theoretical, empirical or quantitative sophistication.
body_text.section: EDITORIAL POLICY

body_text.text: Papers of high quality are welcomed from all areas of advanced macroeconomics and allied fields, so long as the research is founded in a rigorous scientific approach.
body_text.section: EDITORIAL POLICY

body_text.text: Major advances in macroeconomics without immediate policy applications also are accepted, if they show potential for application in the future.
body_text.section: EDITORIAL POLICY

body_text.text: Occasional book reviews, software reviews, announcements, conference proceedings and interviews are published.
body_text.section: EDITORIAL POLICY

body_text.text: An electronic version of the journal is published just prior to the paper version at journals.cambridge.org/mdy.
body_text.section: EDITORIAL POLICY

body_text.text: Access to the full-text articles of the electronic version will be limited to institutional subscribers of the hard copy version of the journal, with access available to all online users at that institution's registered domain.
body_text.section: EDITORIAL POLICY

body_text.text: Tables of Contents, abstracts, searching and alerting services will remain free of charge.
body_text.section: EDITORIAL POLICY

body_text.text: To view the full text of Macroeconomic Dynamics, you will need to use the Adobe Acrobat Reader software.
body_text.section: EDITORIAL POLICY

body_text.text: If you do not have a copy already, you can get it free of charge.
body_text.section: EDITORIAL POLICY

body_text.text: Just follow the link from our Cambridge Journals Online home page, download it, and install it as a plug-in helper application for your browser.
body_text.section: EDITORIAL POLICY
